bio: The Madwoman is encountered randomly throughout Skyrim. She is an Elder woman who will ask for a shot with the Wabbajack. Obeying her wish causes her to transform into a rabbit (always into a rabbit, never randomly). A bounty of 40  is accumulated for the act, which is immediately removed after. She can be found wandering Skyrim before and after completion of the quest "The Mind of Madness."
name: Madwoman
